headline: THE (IRRESISTABLE) NEXT CHAPTER OF THE STORY: KHLOÉ KARDASHIAN RELEASES HER SECOND FRAGRANCE WITH LUXE BRANDS
summary: Global icon and entrepreneur Khloé Kardashian, in partnership with Luxe Brands, continues to solidify her growing fragrance empire with the introduction of her second fragrance: Almost Always. The fragrance will preview on the Ulta Beauty app November 3rd and officially launch online November 5th and November 9th in stores, exclusively at Ulta Beauty in the US. The European launch with lead partner Douglas will follow in November.
